text: The Chairman of the Council of Ministers of the Republic of Crimea (; ; ) is the head of government of the Republic of Crimea, (previously the Autonomous Republic of Crimea located in the southern region of Ukraine). ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website *World Statesmen.org *Avdeyev, Yu. History of the Crimean Premier Office (История крымского премьерства). Krymskaya Pravda. 1 March 2016 *
title: Prime Minister of Crimea
